metadata.title: CVE-2024-40907 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ionic: fix kernel panic in XDP_TX actionIn the XDP_TX path, ionic driver sends a packet to the TX path with rxpage and corresponding dma address.After tx is done, ionic_tx_clean() frees that page.But RX ring buffer isn't reset to NULL.So, it uses a freed page, which causes kernel panic.BUG: unable to handle page fault for address: ffff8881576c110cPGD 773801067 P4D 773801067 PUD 87f086067 PMD 87efca067 PTE800ffffea893e060Oops: Oops: 0000 [#1] PREEMPT SMP DEBUG_PAGEALLOC KASAN NOPTICPU: 1 PID: 25 Comm: ksoftirqd/1 Not tainted 6.9.0+ #11Hardware name: ASUS System Product Name/PRIME Z690-P D4, BIOS 060311/01/2021RIP: 0010:bpf_prog_f0b8caeac1068a55_balancer_ingress+0x3b/0x44fCode: 00 53 41 55 41 56 41 57 b8 01 00 00 00 48 8b 5f 08 4c 8b 77 00 4c 89f7 48 83 c7 0e 48 39 d8RSP: 0018:ffff888104e6fa28 EFLAGS: 00010283RAX: 0000000000000002 RBX: ffff8881576c1140 RCX: 0000000000000002RDX: ffffffffc0051f64 RSI: ffffc90002d33048 RDI: ffff8881576c110eRBP: ffff888104e6fa88 R08: 0000000000000000 R09: ffffed1027a04a23R10: 0000000000000000 R11: 0000000000000000 R12: ffff8881b03a21a8R13: ffff8881589f800f R14: ffff8881576c1100 R15: 00000001576c1100FS: 0000000000000000(0000) GS:ffff88881ae00000(0000) knlGS:0000000000000000CS: 0010 DS: 0000 ES: 0000 CR0: 0000000080050033CR2: ffff8881576c110c CR3: 0000000767a90000 CR4: 00000000007506f0PKRU: 55555554Call Trace:<TASK>?
